title: Every time i load up in Champion select, I constantly freeze when a champ is banned or selected.
body:
And this caused me to have a 5 min queue at one point because i couldn't ban quick enough. This new client seems to be the issue. Is there some possible way to stop this from happening? I never have third party programs up. I even closed everything to see if anything changes. Nope.
Can someone help me resolve this issue?

replies.body: If you have third party programs that interact with league at all, then you might have to remove it entirely in case it's working in the background after closing it.  This could also be a connection issue that's getting cut off and leaving you behind.  You should go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network.  I hope that helps!

I don have any third problem programs.....
And u are saying the reason why the client freezes is because of connection issues?
It's certainly possible that a connection loss can cause you to lose sync and freeze up.  The above guide can help in ruling out that possibility, or fix it.  Let me know if that clears things up!
it is constantly happening to me to im sitting with a 15min ban now im getting really frustrated please take a look at my complaint riot
